snippet.title: AEXIA Demo - April 2023
snippet.description:
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/aexia

AEXIA is a platform that allows game masters (GMs) to host virtual reality (VR) role-playing (RP) experiences without the need for physical locations or costumes.

Join our Discord community to jump in some live games or host your own game: https://discord.com/invite/En4dMuJhFw

Our platform is perfect for gamers who enjoy social, story-driven role-playing games. 

With Aexia, game masters can use our modular authoring tool to create customized games or remix existing games, making it easy to offer unique gameplay experiences that resonate with players.

Sign up for beta: http://eepurl.com/hBkoSL
